title: Meet Our Clinicians - Mind Body Soul Therapy
cleaned_text: Welcome to our website We are an agency with Licensed Marriage and Family Therapists as well as Licensed Clinical Social Workers, who come from a diverse background so that we may serve the diverse population in our service area. We offer services in English and Spanish. Please see the providers below. Meet Our Clinicians Crystal Earwood Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist, #113418 909.682.6541 Specialties: Sexual Issues, Depression, Anxiety, Relationship Issues, LGBTQ, Couples I am currently working on my Doctorate degree in Human Sexuality and am also working on becoming an Advanced Certified Sex and Couples Therapist. I am a member of the California Association of Marriage and Family Therapist (CAMFT), World Professional Association of Transgender Health (WPATH), and United States Professional Association for Transgender Health (USPATH). I have been working with a diverse population for the past fifteen years and enjoy working with individuals from various backgrounds. As a therapist, it is my goal to help individuals achieve and or get back to their maximum potential. I take a collaborative and solution focused approach with clients, while taking each individual and/or couples personal needs into consideration. I am here to assist you in your life's journey with relationships, traumas, life stressors, and anything else that may be negatively affecting you from functioning at your full capacity.
